source.author: Scmidt-Lebuhn, A.N.; Milner, K.V.
source.title: A quantitative study of morphology in Australian Craspedia (Asteraceae, Gnaphalieae)
source.citation: From: Scmidt-Lebuhn, A.N.; Milner, K.V. (2013). A quantitative study of morphology in Australian Craspedia (Asteraceae, Gnaphalieae). Australian Systematic Botany 26:238-254.

leads.lead_text: Scarious margin of bracts subtending capitula wide in the basal part and very thin to absent in the apical part of the bracts, giving them a three-tipped appearance; flowers yellow or sometimes orange
Scarious margin of bract subtending capitula more or less equal around the bracts; flowers orange or sometimes yellow
